description:
Convention is that xapi plugin files do not have extensions (at least not the ones that are invoked directly). xenstore.py break this rule and this is also not consistent with other xapi plugins available in nova trunk

revno: Cactus or above
title: xenstore.py plugin should not have .py extension

comments.content:
Convention is that xapi plugin files do not have extensions (e.g. .py). xenstore.py break this rule and this is also not consistent with other xapi plugins available in nova trunk

revno: Cactus or above
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~armando-migliaccio

comments.content: The .py extension was added because this is meant to be imported by other extensions; there are several similar plugins with .py extensions. The agent plugin imports xenstore.py to read/write to xenstore.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ed-leafe
